Label: util_TNC_Single_Cost
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_single_baseFare * 2 + (odt_skims['TOLLDISTS2'] + dot_skims['TOLLDISTS2']) * TNC_single_costPerMile + (odt_skims['TOLLTIMES2'] + dot_skims['TOLLTIMES2']) * TNC_single_costPerMinute, TNC_single_costMinimum) * 100

Label: util_TNC_Shared_Cost
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_shared_baseFare * 2 + (odt_skims['TOLLDISTS2'] + dot_skims['TOLLDISTS2']) * TNC_shared_costPerMile + (odt_skims['TOLLTIMES2'] + dot_skims['TOLLTIMES2']) * TNC_shared_costPerMinute, TNC_shared_costMinimum) * 100
